page.title: 07SHOTESHAM/HOWE GOVERNMENT
page.content:
The Parish Council is the only body of {GOVERNMENT}convened within the area. Their function is advisory and to liaise between the community and the district council. {LOCAL SERVICES}are few. Home helps, Meals on Wheels and the monthly visit by the Library van are provided by the County Council. Weekly refuse collection and septic tank emptying are provided by the District Council. Night soil collection, though uncommon,is still provided.
The Methodist Chapel is used for a {POLLING STATIONS}at District, County, National and European elections. For Parish elections a small hall is used . European and National farm policies and subsidies directly affect farming in the area.
